00016    class Atom;

00030    class Mask 
00031    {
00032 
00033    public:
00034 
00036       static const int Capacity  = 4;
00037 
00041       Mask();
00042 
00046       void clear();
00047 
00053       void append(int id);
00054 
00061       bool isMasked(int id) const;
00062 
00068       int operator [] (int i) const;
00069 
00073       int size() const;
00074 
00075    private:
00076 
00078       int atomIds_[Capacity];      
00079 
00081       int  size_;                 
00082 
00083    }; 
00084 
00085    // Inline methods
00086 
00087    // Check if an Atom is in the masked set.
00088    inline bool Mask::isMasked(int id) const
00089    {
00090       for (int i=0; i < size_ ; ++i) {
00091          if (atomIds_[i] == id) return true;
00092       }
00093       return false;
00094    }
00095 
00096    /*
00097    * Return the number of masked atoms.
00098    */
00099    inline int Mask::size() const
00100    { return size_; }
00101 
00102    /*
00103    * Return value of index
00104    */
00105    inline int Mask::operator[] (int i) const
00106    {
00107       assert(i >= 0);
00108       assert(i <  size_);
00109       return atomIds_[i]; 
00110    }
00111 
00112 }
